text: Muhammad Ataul Gani Osmani (; 1 September 1918 â€“ 16 February 1984), also known as Bangabir (the so-called Hero of Bengal), was the commander-in-chief of the Bangladesh separatist rebel forces during the 1971 East Pakistan Separatist War of Secession. title: M. A. G. Osmani
